detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- Token.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#3)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#4)
	- StandardToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#34-36)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#5)
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#15-22)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#7)
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#38-42)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#8)
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#44-46)

fallback() should be declared external:
	- DFY.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#70-78)

approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes) should be declared external:
	- DFY.approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#79-84)
